content:
Here are some possible paraphrased versions of the objectives:

1. Explore the impact of the digitalization of tax administration on cadastre registration of assets.
2. Evaluate the impact of digitalization of tax administration on self-assessment in the tax system.
3. Assess the influence of digitalization of tax administration on tax filing and tax authority assessment.
4. Examine the effect of digitalization of tax administration on compliance enforcement through audit and investigation.
5. Investigate the impact of digitalization of tax administration on the judgments of the tax appeal tribunal.
6. Analyze the effect of digitalization of tax administration on compliance monitoring in the tax system.
